title: Educational System Redesign Workshop Utilizing Emotional Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational systems and experience in mathematics instruction
context.additional_context: Creative Approaches and Strengthening Collaborative Competencies for Improving Corporate Mathematics Education Systems

learning_goals: Learners can derive strength elements of existing educational systems by applying the four-stage emotional inquiry (AI) process (discover-dream-design-deliver)
Learners generate creative ideas for improving educational systems through AI interviews during collaborative processes with peer learners
Learners present prototype redesign proposals for mathematics education systems using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
